export class TagNames{}TagNames.FOREIGNOBJECT="FOREIGNOBJECT";export class CSSRuleSorted{constructor(styleNode){this.all=void 0;const oldParent=styleNode.parentElement;if(!oldParent)document.body.append(styleNode);const cssRuleList=styleNode.sheet.cssRules||styleNode.sheet.rules;this.all=[...cssRuleList];if(!oldParent)document.body.removeChild(styleNode);// if (se aveva parent rimane attaccato lì e non serve fare questo) oldParent.append(styleNode);
}getCSSMediaRule(){return this.all.filter((e,i)=>{return e instanceof CSSMediaRule;});}getCSSStyleRule(){return this.all.filter((e,i)=>{return e instanceof CSSStyleRule;});}notIn(list){return this.all.filter((e,i)=>{return list.indexOf(e)!==-1;});}}export class CSSParser{static parse(styleNode){return new CSSRuleSorted(styleNode);}}
